title: foxglove.RawAudio
description: A single block of an audio bitstream

timestamp.title: time
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the start of the audio block

data.description: Audio data. The samples in the data must be interleaved and little-endian

format.description: Audio format. Only 'pcm-s16' is currently supported

number_of_channels.description: Number of channels in the audio block
